html:
Looking for stocking stuffers or getting a head start on goals for 2025? If you‚Äôre an iPhone and Apple Watch user, these budget-friendly fitness accessories are sure to enhance anyone‚Äôs experience without breaking the bank.

Workout essentials

  • Keepamore Elastic Ankle/Arm Band¬†($9.99)
  • HAISSKY Phone Armband¬†($9.99)

Apple Watch accessories

  • Spigen Rugged Armor Apple Watch Case¬†($19.99)
  • Apple Watch Screen Protector 6-Pack¬†($9.99)

Workout enhancement

  • GE Scale for Body Weight Smart¬†($39.99)
  • Large Waterproof Phone Pouch Bag¬†($14.99)
  • TriggerPoint GRID TRAVEL Foam Roller ($29.99)
  • Fitballz Massage Ball Set ($21.99)

Gym bag must-haves

  • AirPods Pro Sports Ear Hooks¬†($12.99)
  • Anker Magnetic Battery Bank¬†($29.74)

Hydration & nutrition

  • BlenderBottle Classic¬†($10.16)
  • ICEWATER 3-in-1 Smart Water Bottle¬†($24.99)

Training aids

  • Fit Simplify Resistance Loop Exercise Bands¬†($8.99)
  • Gritin Jump Rope¬†($8.99)

You can also never go wrong with dry fit t-shirts, shorts, socks, or even a new gym bag to carry all your fitness things. If you‚Äôre using a digital fitness service like Apple Fitness+, you may also want a stand so you can easily view your iPhone or iPad. You can also snag a backup pair of earbuds with water resistance for under $50. For more, see our 2024 Apple Watch buying guide.

  • Rode Wireless Micro
  • Anker Qi2 MagGo Wireless Charging Station
  • Belkin Stage Auto-Tracking Stand Pro with DockKit
